title: Policy combinations to cure a severe recession

content.question: Which of the following policy combinations is most likely to cure a severe recession?

choices.label: Monetary Policy Action Taxes Government Spending Decrease interest on reserves Increase Decrease
Monetary Policy Action Taxes Government Spending Decrease interest on reserves Decrease Increase
Monetary Policy Action Taxes Government Spending Decrease interest on reserves Decrease Decrease
